info.title: Creoline API Docs
info.description:
Hello and welcome to our API documentation.

All endpoints that you can use are listed on the left-hand side.

Clicking on the respective endpoint will take you to the endpoint.

default.name: X-Api-Token
default.description: Nutzen Sie zur Authentifizierung den API-Schl√ºssel Ihrer Organisation

nameserver.description: true to create creoline default nameserver entries

record.description: This field is required unless type is in CAA.

caa_flag.description: This field is required when type is CAA.

caa_type.description: This field is required when type is CAA.

caa_value.description: This field is required when type is CAA.

priority.description: This field is required when type is MX or SRV. Must be between 0 and 65535.

weight.description: This field is required when type is SRV. Must be between 0 and 65535.

port.description: This field is required when type is SRV. Must be between 0 and 65535.

algorithm.description: This field is required when type is SSHFP.

fptype.description: This field is required when type is SSHFP.

tlsa_usage.description: This field is required when type is TLSA.

tlsa_selector.description: This field is required when type is TLSA.

tlsa_matching_type.description: This field is required when type is TLSA.

record.description: This field is required unless type is in CAA.

caa_flag.description: This field is required when type is CAA.

caa_type.description: This field is required when type is CAA.

caa_value.description: This field is required when type is CAA.

priority.description: This field is required when type is MX or SRV. Must be between 0 and 65535.

weight.description: This field is required when type is SRV. Must be between 0 and 65535.

port.description: This field is required when type is SRV. Must be between 0 and 65535.

algorithm.description: This field is required when type is SSHFP.

fptype.description: This field is required when type is SSHFP.

tlsa_usage.description: This field is required when type is TLSA.

tlsa_selector.description: This field is required when type is TLSA.

tlsa_matching_type.description: This field is required when type is TLSA.

destination.description: Must be a valid email address.
Must be a valid email address.

organization.description: This field is required when type is ORG. Must match the regex /^[a-zA-Z0-9√§√∂√º√Ñ√ñ√ú√ü&()\-.[:space:]]+$/. Must be at least 3 characters.

lastname.description: Must match the regex /^[a-zA-Z0-9√§√∂√º√Ñ√ñ√ú()\-.[:space:]]+$/. Must be at least 3 characters.

phone.description: Must be at least 3 characters. Must not be greater than 20 characters.

fax.description: Must be at least 3 characters. Must not be greater than 20 characters.

email.description: Must be a valid email address.

organization.description: Must match the regex /^[a-zA-Z0-9√§√∂√º√Ñ√ñ√ú√ü&()\-.[:space:]]+$/. Must be at least 3 characters.

phone.description: Must be at least 3 characters. Must not be greater than 20 characters.

fax.description: Must be at least 3 characters. Must not be greater than 20 characters.

email.description: Must be a valid email address.
